title: Santa Barbara
name: Santa Barbara County Courthouse
hours: M-F 8AM-5PM, Sa-Su 10AM-4:30PM, Guided tours, M-Sa 2pm and M, Tu, F 10:30am
content: Built in 1929 and the grandest building in the town. A working courthouse, this Spanish-Moorish castle has frescoes, murals and Tunisian tilework. The El Mirador Bell Tower provides great views of the city and the bay. The grounds contain a collection of palms and specimen trees from more than 25 countries and a printed guide to the plants is available.
